main: Seitheric energy pours out from the top of the grand tower in 7 waves.

The first returned all demons it came across to the black dust, the true form. The second, tainted the soul core of all pure living humans. Permanently and unchangeably.The third collected all the free moving remnants of true demons for redistribution. The fourth, analysed the average energy within each living Demonkin. The fifth bent every living creature to a new form of the Queen's choosing. The sixth reconstructed all atomized demons into similar forms, and the seventh merely conveyed a simple message.
'A new dawn is upon the world, and any who would deny my peace will be rendered to less than dust.'

In truth, Momiji creates a utilitarian dictatorship. One where she controls the level of demonic power each individual gets. Those who work hard and strive for peace are given the most strength, and the liars, the violent, the traitorous, are given just enough to live. Those who seek to bring dissent and chaos into her rule are quietly and swiftly silenced by her invincible remnant. Asides from the Devimancer Micah who defected, the Society of Blue is labelled a terrorist group, and their current whereabouts are unknown. The path to peace is fraught with uncertainty, but so long as the Demon Queen sits atop her throne, the world will march ever closer.
